segments.text: I have never done this before and don ’ t know where to begin as far as making an offer on this house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Leave the details of making the offer up to me . What were you thinking you should offer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I absolutely must have this house and will pay three hundred and fifty thousand dollars or more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is best to start a little low on the first bid to allow for a counter-offer . How about offering three hundred and twenty thousand dollars ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope that the owners aren ’ t insulted by that offer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your offering price is not out-of-line . The owners will either take it or make a counter-offer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does it usually take very long for the owners to get back to you with an acceptance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It usually doesn ’ t take very long for owners to respond to an offer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Should I be in touch with my bank to tell them to get the loan papers ready ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The only thing you should do now is relax . You already are pre-qualified for your loan .
segments.speaker: S2
